trans-unit.source: Configures an HTTP handler for a Web application.
trans-unit.target: Configura um manipulador HTTP para um aplicativo Web.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The HttpHandlersSection class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `httpHandlers` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: A classe HttpHandlersSection fornece uma maneira de acessar e modificar programaticamente o `httpHandlers` seção de um arquivo de configuração.

trans-unit.source: This type is part of a group that includes the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction> and the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerActionCollection> types.
trans-unit.target: Esse tipo é parte de um grupo que inclui o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction>e o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerActionCollection>tipos.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerActionCollection> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The HttpHandlersSection can read and write information from and to the related section of the configuration file according to the <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> section property whose value is <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > HttpHandlersSection o pode ler e gravar informações de e para a seção correspondente do arquivo de configuração de acordo com a <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>propriedade de seção cujo valor é <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition> </xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The HttpHandlersSection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: O construtor HttpHandlersSection não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado pelo sistema de configuração do ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Obter uma instância de <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection>classe usando o <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>método.</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerActionCollection"></xref> collection of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref> objects contained by the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerActionCollection"> </xref> coleção de <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"> </xref> objetos contidos pelo <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The Handlers property collection returned by this method does not refer to any actual element in the underlying configuration file.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de manipuladores de propriedades retornada por esse método não faz referência a qualquer elemento no arquivo de configuração subjacentes.

trans-unit.source: It is a <xref:System.Web.Configuration> construct that allows easy access to the handlers it contains.
trans-unit.target: É um <xref:System.Web.Configuration>construção que permite o fácil acesso para os manipuladores que ele contém.</xref:System.Web.Configuration>

trans-unit.source: This is a common pattern for handling the elements of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Este é um padrão comum para lidar com os elementos de um arquivo de configuração.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerActionCollection"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref> objects, or handlers.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerActionCollection"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"> </xref> objetos ou manipuladores.
